      • SelfOrganizingMap

        public SelfOrganizingMap(int numberOfNodes,
                 int depth,
                 int grid,
                 int inputDimensison)
        Parameters:
        numberOfNodes - as the total set of nodes in the final 2D map
        depth - as the depth or the number of rows in the map
        grid - as the type of grid (0 = square, 1 = rectangle, 2 = hexagonal)
        inputDimension - the dimension of the input data vector

      • setEuclideanAccumulatedValue

        private maps.Structures.Node setEuclideanAccumulatedValue(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.ArrayRealVector input)
        Parameters:
        input - as the input vector presented to the network.
        Returns:
        the winner node of the iteration Similar to setAccumulatedValue(ArrayRealVector) needs to use only one of these methods to select the winner. Euclidean measure takes the minimum value.

      • setAccumulatedValue

        private maps.Structures.Node setAccumulatedValue(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.ArrayRealVector input)
        Parameters:
        input - as the input vector presented to the network
        Returns:
        the winner node of the iteration Similar to setEuclideanAccumulatedValue(ArrayRealVector) need to use only one of these methods to selec the winner. The multiplication based method takes the maximum value.
